last_episode_to_air.name: A Band Done
last_episode_to_air.overview: After a former band mate talks Kevin into reuniting with their old band, Smokefish, with hopes of making it big, Vanessa realizes a chance encounter with the band in her past changed the course of her life.

name: Kevin Can Wait
overview: A newly retired police officer looks forward to spending more quality time with his wife and three kids only to discover he faces much tougher challenges at home than he ever did on the streets.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Kevin, a newly retired police officer looking forward to spending carefree, quality time with his wife and three kids, only to find he faces tougher challenges at home than he ever did on the streets.

episodes.name: Sleep Disorder
episodes.overview: Kevin rearranges the house to his liking after his buddies convince him that Donna makes all their decisions and has taken over the house for her own benefit. Also, Kendra enlists her Uncle Kyle to help toughen up Chale.

episodes.name: Chore Weasel
episodes.overview: Kevin thinks he’s got it made when he hires Blake via a new online app that supplies people to do household chores while he plays football with his buddies and then takes all the credit with Donna.

episodes.name: Kevin's Good Story
episodes.overview: Kevin gets into trouble for using Goody's heroic cop story from a long time ago when he forgets his wedding anniversary.

episodes.name: Beat the Parents
episodes.overview: Kevin and Donna are thrilled when their son, Jack, makes friends with a boy from school, Grayden, however, when Donna and Kevin don’t hit it off with Grayden’s arrogant father, Vic, and his pushy wife, Brandi, they set out to sabotage the boys’ new friendship,

episodes.name: Hallow-We-Ain't-Home
episodes.overview: On Halloween, Kevin and Donna's neighbors "trick" them in holiday style when they pretend not to be home to avoid giving out candy. Also, Chale has an altercation with a man dressed as a Viking.

episodes.name: Who's Better Than Us?
episodes.overview: When Kevin's ego is bruised after learning his former partner (Adam Sandrrr) has a young, buff rookie named Nick (Chris Weidman), to ride with, he tries to reconnect by showing him what he's missing.

episodes.name: The Power of Positive Drinking
episodes.overview: When Kevin takes a job as a bartender, he goes too far when he starts dispensing unsolicited advice to his customers.

episodes.name: The Fantastic Pho
episodes.overview: Kevin convinces his buddies to invest in his new food truck venture, but when his chef quits, Kevin's worried he bit off more than he can chew.

episodes.name: I'll Be Home For Christmas... Maybe
episodes.overview: Kevin volunteers to help Mott and his seven kids prepare for the holidays while Mott's wife is away, much to the dismay of Donna who is left high and dry on her own until Kyle swoops in to help.

episodes.name: Ring Worm
episodes.overview: After Kevin learns Chale took a job to buy Kendra an engagement ring, he decided to make good on his overdue promise to buy Donna a proper ring but his plan backfires when he tries to surprise her.

episodes.name: Kevin vs. the Dutch Elm
episodes.overview: As Kevin tries to charm his neighbor into giving him permission to cut down one of her trees, he becomes intimidated by her imposing son and invites them over for a non-existent party.

episodes.name: Choke Doubt
episodes.overview: Kevin brags about saving a man from choking after hearing how much attention his brother Kyle is receiving for saving a cat, Adam Ferrara guest stars as Bill, a man Kevin saves from choking, and "The Insider" correspondent Michael Yo guest stars as Tom, a morning show anchor who interviews Kyle.

episodes.name: The Back Out
episodes.overview: Kevin and Donna jeopardize their chance for a kid-free vacation care of their chiropractor, when he catches them 'cheating' on him with his colleague. Also, Kyle is still bitter that Kevin overlooked him to be best man at his wedding to Donna.

episodes.name: Unholy War
episodes.overview: Kevin competes with his childhood nemesis who is intent on reserving the same church date for his daughter's nuptials that Kendra wants for her wedding to Chale.  Both men battle for the priest's approval by becoming more involved in the church.

episodes.name: Neighborhood Watch
episodes.overview: Kevin concocts an elaborate plan to get out of having to spend time with Donna's cousin Irene and her chatty husband.

episodes.name: Showroom Showdown
episodes.overview: When Kevin and Chale get jobs working in the warehouse at an electronics store to help pay for the wedding, Chale's quick promotion to the sales floor kick-starts Kevin's competitive side.

episodes.name: Double Date
episodes.overview: After Goody and Didi invite the Motts on a weekend getaway with them, Kevin and Donna are offended by the friendship demotion and go online to find new couples to hang out with.

episodes.name: Quiet Diet
episodes.overview: When Donna says she'll send Kevin to the Mets Fantasy Camp if he lowers his cholesterol, Chale secretly coaches him through a juice cleanse...

episodes.name: Sting Of Queens: Part One
episodes.overview: Once again, pose as husband and wife. Also, Donna is up for a promotion, Kendra gets accepted to law school, and Chale gets a lucrative new job.

episodes.name: Civil Ceremony
episodes.overview: Kendra and Chale must get married immediately when the Gables learn that he is about to be deported. As Kevin chases down Father Phillip to officiate the ceremony, Vanessa helps Kendra put together the last-minute affair.

episodes.name: Business Unusual
episodes.overview: Overwhelmed by Kevin’s helicopter parenting, Kendra tricks him into taking a job at Vanessa’s new private security company.

episodes.name: Kevin Goes Nuts
episodes.overview: After Vanessa suggests that Sara has a secret boyfriend, Kevin goes undercover to find out the truth.

episodes.name: Plus One is the Loneliest Number
episodes.overview: After Vanessa's relationship with a hunky doctor goes bust before her sister's wedding, Kevin steps in as her 'successful doctor' date. Also, Kyle helps Kendra and Chale make a fake photo collage of honeymoon pictures to tout on social media

episodes.name: Grief Thief
episodes.overview: Vanessa plots her revenge on Kevin after learning he lied about attending a football game with Goody; Chale and Kendra have their first squabble as a married couple.

episodes.name: The Owl
episodes.overview: Kevin and Chale set out on a road trip to retrieve an owl-shaped cookie jar that Kevin sold before realizing how much it meant to Kendra. Also, after Vanessa rejects Kyle's attempt to woo her, she and Kendra help get him back on the dating scene.

episodes.name: The Kevin Crown Affair
episodes.overview: When Kevin and Vanessa try to land a security gig at a toy store, they get sidetracked practicing their new business pitch and wind up locked in the store after hours. Also, Chale is having success working at Enzo's.

episodes.name: Slip ‘n' Fall
episodes.overview: Kevin and Vanessa concoct a plan when they fear Rootger might sue them after he slips and injures himself at their office. Also, Kendra dispenses legal advice at Enzo's for paying customers.

episodes.name: Cooking up a Storm
episodes.overview: After Kevin insists he can handle cooking a full Thanksgiving dinner for Vanessa and his family, he realizes he's in over his head and secretly askes his flirtatious neighbor for help.

episodes.name: Kevin Moves Metal
episodes.overview: As part of a security job, Kevin goes undercover as a janitor at a car dealership. Also, Chale reveals his phobia of puppets after learning that Kendra used to be into ventriloquism.

episodes.name: Trainer Wreck
episodes.overview: After Vanessa asks Kevin to help her get a date with a handsome personal trainer, Alejandro, she gets frustrated when Kevin starts training with him instead. Also, Chale reluctantly takes advice from Kyle when the health inspector stops by Enzo's.

episodes.name: The Might've Before Christmas
episodes.overview: While Vanessa and the Gable family gather around the Christmas tree, Vanessa and Kevin reminisce about their first patrol together.

episodes.name: Monkey Fist Insecurity
episodes.overview: After Kevin and Vanessa nail a pitch for a new job for their security company, Monkey Fist, they run into Frank, the owner of a rival company who is determined to put them out of business by pitting Kevin and Vanessa against each other.

episodes.name: Kevin Can Date
episodes.overview: Vanessa encourages Kevin to ask out a client after she shows interest in him.

episodes.name: Fight or Flight
episodes.overview: Vanessa claims she and Kevin are newlyweds in order to get bumped up to first class on a business trip.

episodes.name: Wingmen
episodes.overview: fter Kevin and Vanessa witness Kyle's success using a dating app that requires a close friend to choose one's perfect match, they agree to be each other's wingman and try their hand at matchmaking.

episodes.name: The Whole Enchilada
episodes.overview: After convincing Kevin to break things off with his neighbor, Wendy, who had reeled him in with her delicious meals, Vanessa feels compelled to cook for him despite being culinarily challenged.

episodes.name: Delivery Guy
episodes.overview: Vanessa convinces Kevin to go on a TV talk show with the "baby boy" he helped deliver years ago as a cop, but her plan to promote Monkey Fist backfires when Kevin runs into his arch-nemesis, Frank Munson.

episodes.name: Forty Seven Candles
episodes.overview: Vanessa thinks she's friendless when none of her pals are available to go to dinner with her on her birthday. Feeling lonely while waiting for Kevin to pick her up for what she thinks is just a dinner for two, she gets tipsy with Kyle.

episodes.name: The Smoking Bun
episodes.overview: Plans to knock it down and build a parking lot. But when Alviti makes them a lucrative job offer, the future of Enzo's is at stake.

episodes.name: Phat Monkey
episodes.overview: When Monkey Fist lands Alviti’s big account to provide security for his parking garages, Kevin inadvertently derails Rootger’s efforts to study for his security guard test and puts the new job in jeopardy, much to Vanessa’s dismay. Also, Kendra and Chale try to persuade an investor to help finance their brew pub idea.

episodes.name: Brew Ha Ha
episodes.overview: Kevin offers to help Kendra and Chale buy Enzo’s, but they soon realize that the partnership won’t work when Kevin’s idea of a silent partner is not so silent. As the tension among them escalates, Kendra and Chale find peace at Vanessa’s apartment.

episodes.name: A Band Done
episodes.overview: After a former band mate talks Kevin into reuniting with their old band, Smokefish, with hopes of making it big, Vanessa realizes a chance encounter with the band in her past changed the course of her life.
